name: getObjectStorageBucket
description:
Returns a single Object Storage Bucket.


This endpoint is available for convenience. It is recommended that instead you
use the more [fully-featured S3 API](https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/s3/bucketops/#get-bucket) directly.

clusterId.description: The ID of the cluster this bucket exists in.

$block: An Object Storage Bucket. This should be accessed primarily through the S3 API; [click here for more information](https://docs.ceph.com/en/latest/radosgw/s3/#api).

$ul: **cluster**: The ID of the Object Storage Cluster this bucket is in.
**hostname**: The hostname where this bucket can be accessed. This hostname can be accessed through a browser if the bucket is made public.
**objects**: The number of objects stored in this bucket.
**size**: The size of the bucket in bytes.
